name: Ludum Dara 48 deeper and deeper
description:
It is my ludum jam 48 game optimization version

This version Changed
  • Add leaderboard
  • Add eye petrify effect
  • Eye level show
  • Move operation improve
  • Help changed
  • Gameover UI changed
  • Add animation play speed setting
  • Add chinese language
  • Bug fixed
  • Performance optimization
Game Goal

Go down as possible as you can.

How to Play

Shoot different color cube to destroy. 

Shoot the same color cube will make the cubes that around it grey. 

Grey cubes can not be destroyed.

Gameover

There is no any possibility to drop the cannon more further.

Such as all the cubes around the cannon are grey.
